html_content_preview:
Discover the captivating tales that have shaped Scotland's unique cultural heritage

Published on July 17, 2025 | By Caitrin Stewart

Ancient Celtic Story-telling

In ancient Scotland, story-telling was deeply rooted in Celtic tradition. The Picts and Scotts, inhabiting Scotland from around 400 BC to AD, orally passed down tales grounded in nature, mythology, and the supernatural.
